articles.title: 'More demand than supply': Cinemas max out first weekend back - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Movie fans have returned to socially-distanced cinemas, with many experiencing sold-out sessions in their first weekend since reopening following the March shutdown.
articles.content: National cinema chains including Hoyts, Event and Palace reopened to audiences on Thursday, with restricted capacity. In NSW, cinemas are bound by the "one person-per-four square metre" rule, while i… [+3428 chars]
